Step toward 12 o'clock with your left foot (left neutral bow), as you deliver a left downward chop to the outside of opponent's left forearm, simultaneously cocking your right hand near your right ear.
Shift (in place) to a left forward bow as you deliver a right downward chop to opponent's left wrist.
Shift (in place) to a neutral bow as you deliver a left outward chop (palm down) to opponent's throat.

Step forward and back of opponent's right leg with your right foot into a right neutral bow as you deliver a right heel of palm strike under opponent's chin. (Left hand should be checking near your right ribs.)
Right front crossover and cover out twice toward 6 o'clock.
